entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use the new Photo Picker on Android 11+ in Essentials Picker API #9615
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Introduce the Generic.xaml concept #9612
  • VS2022 17.4 Prev 1.0 updated - new MAUI app - Windows Machine - DEP0700: Registration of the app failed. [0x80073CF0] error 0x80070003 #9611
  • MAUI for Linux #9610
  • Can .net maui have better support for AppWidget in mobile segments? #9608
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Embedding MAUI-Open MAUI "Page" from Xamarin.Android #9606
    Backlog
  • Problem with Shell back button #9604
  • resource raw/ca (aka com.companyname.gestorordenadores.client.maui:raw/ca) not found #9602
  • Problem with object on Android platform #9601
  • MAUI iOS is not working properly after it is delivered to Appstore, or TestFlight #9597
  • GraphicsView does not call Drawable's Draw() after each Invalidate on iOS #9595
    Backlog
  • Searchbar keyboard is switching back to alphabet characters immediately after entering one numeric character #9594
    Backlog

Closed

  • ZIndex Xaml Markup Causes Crash on Release Build but Not Debug #9554
  • "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" are unnecessarily given as headings. #6474
    .NET 7
  • No role is defined for "Click here to view full recipe" control. #6473
    .NET 7
  • .NET MAUI App Service/Background Task #9598
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Package signature validation failed" #9573
  • [iOS] Type x:String not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #9580
  • Label with TextType=Html crash when set & to Text property. #9596
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on Android, but on Windows #9587
  • Cannot compile for build 17763 (Windows 10 version 1809) #9463
  • Cross-platform solution for Right click context menu on desktop app #7777
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Picker ItemsSource binding failed #9496
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ItemsSource cannot be changed on a Picker on Windows #9239
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't add space around collapsed children when measuring stack layouts #9616
  • Initial code to support the window manager #9614
    platform/windows 🪟, area/lifecycle 🔁, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [net7.0] remove $(NoWarn) for AD0001 #9605
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #9603
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix format #9600
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [WIP] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer #9592
    area/desktop 🖥️

Merged

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Updating WinSdkBuildTools to 10.0.22621.1 #9588
    community ✨, 7.0-rc1
  • Set the link mode to None when using interpreter #8450
    7.0-rc1
  • [Windows] Notify changes in Picker ItemsSource #9584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9593
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470
    area/layout 🔲
  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • [xamlc] fix compiled {OnPlatform} #9205
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0-servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 #9577
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix typo in ScrollToRequest.cs #9574
    community ✨
